attributes.action: Stop the Rail Freight Terminal being built in St Albans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal is for the development of an international rail freight exchange. This development is to comprise 5 huge warehouses, the largest of which is over 1 million square feet, and each will be served by a railway siding such that goods can be moved from railway freight wagons into storage in the warehouses, and ultimatately onto HGV's. The site is the last large piece of Green Belt Land between St Albans and London
